answers.answer: Happens a lot actually, I know a few mamas that failed their first and passed the second. I was only given a 2 hour test and failed and didn't get a second test. GOOD LUCK!!
Thanks you oh i hope i pass!

question: How many mamas failed the one hour test but passed the 3 hour test? Redoing my test Tuesday ... Super anxious.
title: gestational diabetes ... fail then pass?
